div.p:
ndah nihan varahakna mami rumuhun ri saṅ sevaka dharma katkan kita rumәṅәkna kavivekankaviven saṅ hyaṅ dharma, mvaṅ kabyavasthānikaṅkabyaṁvasṭanikaṁkabyavas·tanika saṅ hyaṅ ajñāna, hana trikāyamaṇḍalatrikaya man·dalatrakayamandala pariśuddha, ṅaṅaranya, inujarakәn saṅ pandita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ya pantahan kvekikvakikvakiṅ ulah śabda lavan ambәk, yan kvayekvayekvaṁ hana ma
līnamalina:maṁline ri hr̥dayantapr̥ḍayantaprǝdayan·ta, ya teka prahprǝh pәgәṅәn rakṣa pahayu juga ya, apan hetuniṅhentaniṁhentuniṁ manәmvakәnmanimvakәn śukhadukha halahayu,

yan pinahala ulahta, śabdata, ambәktaAmbhǝktaAmbhakta, niyata kapaṅguhnikaṅkapaguḥnikaṁ hala denta yan maṅkana, yan pinahayu ulahta,
śabdata, ambәkta, avas kapaṅguhnikaṅ hayuta yan maṅkana, mataṅyan hana paribhāṣa kumva ṅ madyus-dyusḍyas·ḍyas· vvay tinәmunya kasvabhāvaniṅkasvambhavaniṁ janma, hala tumәmu halanya, hayu tumәmu hayunya, maṅkana lvirniṅlvarniṁ janma,

ndya ḍr̥ṣṭānta, i riki dadyanya, hala deniṅ halanya, hayu deniṅ hayunya, nihan upadyanta hana ya maṇik anargha, ṅa, tan kinavruhankinavraḥhan· mulyanya, tan paprameya ri rahayu, kaliṅanya ikaṅ maṇik anargha, lavan maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭaṭāṣavesṭa, yvagya karikāpusәn karita ri gaṅsa, tambaga lavan timah, aparan ta yvagyanika, niyatār
mijil śrīnika lavan dhanuhnika, maṅka pva yvagyagyapa paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭa,
nihan liṅnira ri saṅ hyaṅ śāstra

p.foreign: lpas ca vuṁkunuṁ ceva, aḍika udika tatte tatur tathya tuṅgәṁ, ta deva nigaḍyate

div.p:
apan sinaṅguh rambut lәpas, ṅa, vulu pasagi, ṅa, hana uḍika, hana tater, hana sorasa, ṅa, ika ta kabaih yvagya karika paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭa, taham pih yāpusәn ta ri gaṅsa tambaga lavan timah, aparan ta yvagyanika, paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikә
tan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa, nahan liṅnya ri saṅ hyaṅ śāstra, lpәs ca vuṁkunuṁ cevacova, Aḍi Ikaṁ, Uḍi Ika:, tate:r tatur tatya tuṅgәṅ nu yvagyanika

hana ya mas kanaka santaṅvaṅ, ṅa, mas kanaka jatirupa, sakati mulyanya, vrǝttyavrǝt inapisan pituṅ apitu, matәmahan ta ya satahil i vatuvasta bratnyabranya, ndya ya teka tuṅgәṅ, tan limbaklibaklimbhak tan lǝgәṅ, an inapi muvah, apan samaṅkana juga, pinakadadiniṅpinaḥkaḍaḍiniṁpinakaḍiniṁ mas kabaih, ndah ya teka yvagya rahayu paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭa,

ya ta kapusan deni gaṅsanaṁsa ta
mbaga lavan timah
, tar mijil śrīnika lavan dhanuhnika, aparanparan tar yuktinikauk·tinika, salah nija salah karma, salah svara, bhava ṅaranika, iva maṅkana ta saṅ hyaṅ dharma viśeṣa, sira maṇik anargha, ṅuniveh avakta yeka manik sarveṣṭa ṅaranya, ndah ta yāṅkәn gaṅsa tambaga lavan timah ika tan yvagya rakәtaknara:kǝn·takǝna iri
kaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa,

nihan ya ulah mahala, śabda tar yukti, ambǝkAmbhǝkAmbhak magәlәh ri kapva kaṅṭā janma, ṅuniveh ri saṅ paṇḍita, kaliṅanya tan yvagya kari ulah mahala śabda tar yukti, ambǝk magәlәh, rasa
kәn i saṅ hyaṅ dharma, lavan arakṣari sari śarīranta, ṅuni
veh ri saṅ paṇḍita, taham asih tar yukti ika, punaruktanikaṅpunaḥruktaḥnikaṁpunaḥrutaḥnikaṁ kavvaṅanta, hilaṅ masihniṅ manakmavak maṅrabi, maṇik makadaṅ mvaṅ renantarenakta, ya tan vnaṅ rumakṣa ikaṅ ulah mahala śabda tar yukti ambǝk magәlәh ri kapva kaṅ janma, ṅuniveh ri saṅ sādhu, ndyanadyi yvagya paṅrakṣanta, ri śarīranta, yekayekvaṁ santaṅvaṅ liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, kanaka santaṅva ṅaranya
, ulah rahayu, śabda rahayu, ambәk rahayu, ya rakṣaknarakṣakǝnarasakǝn saṅ hyaṅ darma,

nihan mataṅyan trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, tri ṅaraniṅ tәlu, śuddha ta ya trikāyatrikayatrakaya maṇḍalam, ityuktamItyatǝmItikyatǝm, nahannihan trikāyatrikayatrakaya liṅ saṅ paṇḍita,

nihanniha tambaynyatǝmbǝynyatǝmbhǝy·nya sih saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, pariśuddha ta ri ambәkAmbhǝka rahayu, usǝnUsin hayva kasәlapan ambәk magәlәh, nirmalaṁ hr̥dayamradayǝmhradayǝm citam, ndah pahaliṅlaṅ kaṅtaṁ manah pvāmbǝkpvambhikpva ma:bǝk tiṅәt maṅaṅәn-aṅәn, prihәn bhikṣālakṣanambhǝkṣalakṣanǝm,

nihan lakṣaṇanta viku, hayva tr̥ṣṇa ri hulun juga, byakta taṅ rambut pinәgatanya tanta pәgati, tan kavighātakavigataḥkivigata malaṅ kva hana, ya tika pariśuddha timpalaknatimpalakǝnkantimpalakǝna kuna rǝtakna, ya ta mas r̥kr̥t masәkar vañva, ṅa, maṅkana ta kita maseva
ka di saṅ paṇḍita, hayva ta kita gumavayakna gurutalpaka, jagat upadrava, katakutakathakutan· ri sira, bhaktyānukul ta kita ri saṅ guru, gavayakna kasupraṇatakasuprana, di saṅ guru, tǝka ri saṅ paṇḍita, dataṅ ta ri kasādhyanya,

maṅkana ta kita hulun ri saṅ paṇḍita, ṅuniveh saṅ prabhu, tar gavayakna prabhu drohakadvahak·dvahaka, dәṇḍana vinigrahadǝndana vinigrahadǝndan avigraha katakuta ri sira, marapvan ta kita na kajvalkajvala pati biṣama, bhaktya ta kita ri prabhu, mataṅyan tәka ri kasādhyanyakadaḍyanyakasanḍyanya, maṅkanamakana ta kita rāma, kalaṅ, gusti, patih ri banva, kunaṅ dharma tulājñānaniṅ kadi kita, hayva ta kita ti
mpaṅ svara ri byavahāra, tan paṅivakǝn tәṅәnpaṅivakǝ tǝṅǝnpaṅivakǝn tǝṅǝ ri guṇadosa, tar yukti purihniṅ vvaṅ atuha, ujar saṅ hyaṅ āgama, hayva tutaknanta, ya ta mataṅyan tar katǝkan trikāyamaṇḍalam cittamtr̥kaya mandalәm citәm·, nihan saṅ hyaṅ trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, ya tәmbәynya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma,

ika hana kapindva asihsih saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ya daśaśīla, ṅa, ndya ya nihan, śrotrasvaṭāThe list of ten organs is based on L 642, L 633 contains a different enumeration, i.e., svaṭā, tǝvǝk, cakṣuḥ, jihva, grana, vak, pani, pada, payu, pastra. This implies to the different order on their explanations. Despite the order, both mss. generaly share the same readings, so the variant are recorded in the apparatus., cakṣuh, ghrāṇa, jihva, vāk, tvak, pāṇi, pāyūpasthapayu:pasṭapayu, pas·tra, pāda, iniThe ms.633 and ms642 have the same reading on this word. This word is not attested in OJ, but common in OS. I consider it as OS intervention. rǝṅәkna saṅ sevaka dharma,

śrotrasvaṭā ṅaraniṅ taliṅa, apa viṣayaniṅ taliṅa
, pinakadvāraniṅpinakaḍvaraniṁpinadvaraniṁ maṅrǝṅә ikaṅ śabda hala hayu, maṅrǝṅәṅǝ kita śabda manis arumhuma:sa:rum· enak manahta, maṅrǝṅәṅa pva kita śabda mahala, sәsәksǝsǝsakṣak ta kahiḍǝpantakana hdap·tan ahidǝpǝn· doṣanika, tan piniṇḍvakәnpaniḍakәnpaniḍvakǝn kārya hayu ri saṅ guru, ya ta kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, tuli maṅrǝṅә aji saṅsa viku,

cakṣuh ṅaraniṅ mata, apa visayaniṅ mata, anon hala hayu, aveh sukhaduhkha, yar apayar napaya yan apa apa ikaI aveh sukhasuka duka, pinakapanonta ri ulah rahayu laṅsar kita denya, yan apa ika avehpaveḥ duhkha, mulata mas ri paḍanya janma len saka rika, lumakulumakva ta kita mareṅ sabhānsabaAn·, anonAnvananna ma
ra kita vvaṅvva cheda, vuḍug, tugәl, tәlihәntilihǝn·, buḍaya, tikәl, kәjәṅ, kәkәṅ, salvirniṅ virūpabiparupabimarupa haneṅhane rat, ṅuniveh buta tulīniṅtulittttttttttg panvan paṅrǝṅə̄, hayva seḍa kunaṅ kita yan anvan vvaṅ chedakṣara, hayva ta kita maṅkana, caṇḍaparihāra ṅaranya, apan tar kinavruhan ikaṅ nijakarma, ṅuniveh vvaṅ duhkha denika, ya ta kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma,
bibliography of previous editions, discussion, etc.
